definition: to bake/to heat by fire/to set off by contrast
one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)

sentences.english: Dryer, which makes your fine hair full and tangly .
sentences.chinese: 烘乾機，使您的氄充分和糾纏。
在衣物烘乾機中找到錢。

sentences.english: Wash your bras by hand, and never put them in the dryer or sun-dry them.
sentences.chinese: 手洗文胸，不要放在烘乾機裏或曬乾。

sentences.english: The warehouses have certified truck scales and railroad, as well as grain dryers.
sentences.chinese: 該倉庫有認證的車重計量器和鐵路以及糧食烘乾機。

sentences.english: The machine is a improvement product of scotch pine-cone baking dryer in application.
sentences.chinese: 該機是樟子松球果烘乾機推廣應用的改進產品。

sentences.english: Unlike other clothes, you cannot use a dryer for fireproofing a cloth.
sentences.chinese: 不像其他的衣服，你不能用烘乾機把防火衣烘乾。

sentences.english: Many facilities enclose tumblers separately from the rest of the laundry.
sentences.chinese: 許多設施都把烘乾機與洗衣房裏的其它設備分開放置。

sentences.english: Never leave your clothes in the dryer.
sentences.chinese: 不要把衣服放在烘乾機裏。

sentences.english: After-treatment is carried out on a tensionless drier.
sentences.chinese: 後整理在松式烘乾機上進行。

sentences.english: Please close the door after finish using washing machine and dryer.
sentences.chinese: 洗衣機及烘乾機使用後請隨手將門關上。
